content.title: Retirement Benefits for Child with Disabilities
content.headline: Retirement Benefits for Child with Disabilities
content.summary: Social Security is part of the retirement plan for almost every American worker. It may provide income support for adult children with disabilities who are unable to work and whose parents receive retirement benefits. Complete just one application to be considered for all benefits administered by the Social Security Administration.

eligibility.label: You are at least 18 years old.

content.title: Retirement Benefits for Child
content.headline: Retirement Benefits for Child
content.summary: Social Security is part of the retirement plan for almost every American worker. It may provide income support for minor children of parents who receive retirement benefits. Complete just one application to be considered for all benefits administered by the Social Security Administration.

eligibility.label: You are under 18 years old (under 19 years old if you are a full-time student in an elementary or secondary school).

content.title: Retirement Benefits for Mothers/Fathers
content.headline: Retirement Benefits for Mothers/Fathers
content.summary: Social Security is part of the retirement plan for almost every American worker. It provides replacement income for qualified retirees and their families. Complete just one application to be considered for all benefits administered by the Social Security Administration.

birth_date: Your (the applicant's) date of birth is
